name: Duped
description: Explore a cold, dark cave. Solve puzzles to get up, and get out. Free demo available.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
